WASHINGTON - Is not random (source) (Source): This article states that several high-profile patients have developed remission after receiving this treatment. However, none of those who received it since then has been able to recover from cancer surgery and chemotherapy without major complications or relapse symptoms such as weight loss/weight gain , nausea like vomiting / abdominal pain etc., although they are still at risk for recurrence .
